thread.title: FDA Sends Warning Letters to Scope Makers
thread.title_full: FDA Sends Warning Letters to Scope Makers - WSJ

author: Thomas M. Burton
title: FDA Sends Warning Letters to Scope Makers
text:
The Food and Drug Administration sent warning letters to the three makers of a specialized medical device that has been linked to outbreaks of so-called superbug infections at U.S. hospitals.
The FDA conducted inspections of the manufacturing plants in the spring and said the companies either didnâ€™t adequately report infections or failed to provide sufficient evidence that its cleaning procedures work.
